content.text: Match ends, Hapoel Be'er Sheva 0, Southampton 0.
Second Half ends, Hapoel Be'er Sheva 0, Southampton 0.
Attempt blocked. Ovidiu Hoban (Hapoel Be'er Sheva) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by John Ogu.
Attempt blocked. Dusan Tadic (Southampton) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Ben Sahar (Hapoel Be'er Sheva) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Ben Sahar (Hapoel Be'er Sheva).
Maya Yoshida (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Southampton. Pierre-Emile Højbjerg replaces Nathan Redmond.
Foul by Ben Bitton (Hapoel Be'er Sheva).
Shane Long (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Tony Nwakaeme (Hapoel Be'er Sheva) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Shir Tzedek with a headed pass.
Corner,  Hapoel Be'er Sheva. Conceded by Fraser Forster.
Attempt saved. Ovidiu Hoban (Hapoel Be'er Sheva) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Maor Bar Buzaglo.
Attempt saved. Dusan Tadic (Southampton) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt missed. Shir Tzedek (Hapoel Be'er Sheva) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is too high. Assisted by Maor Bar Buzaglo with a cross following a set piece situation.
Substitution, Hapoel Be'er Sheva. Ovidiu Hoban replaces Maharan Radi.
Maor Bar Buzaglo (Hapoel Be'er Sheva) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Matt Targett (Southampton).

Attempt missed. Tony Nwakaeme (Hapoel Be'er Sheva) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Substitution, Hapoel Be'er Sheva. Maor Bar Buzaglo replaces Maor Melikson.
Attempt missed. Maor Melikson (Hapoel Be'er Sheva) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Tony Nwakaeme.
Offside, Southampton. Oriol Romeu tries a through ball, but Nathan Redmond is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Oriol Romeu (Southampton) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right following a set piece situation.

Attempt missed. Lucio Maranhão (Hapoel Be'er Sheva) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ben Bitton with a cross.
Second Half begins Hapoel Be'er Sheva 0, Southampton 0.
